text: Makhmut Akhmetovich Gareyev ( ) (June 23, 1923 - December 25, 2019) was a Russian General of the Army, a historian, and a military scientist. He was the former Deputy Chief of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of the USSR. He was the president of the Russian Academy of Military Sciences. Gareyev held the Doctor of Science degree in History and Military Science.Bio Gareev was born in Chelyabinsk. He died on December 25, 2019 in Moscow at the age of 96.Ушел из жизни генерал армии Махмут Гареев ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1923 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Russian historians Category:Russian scientists Category:Soviet generals Category:People from Chelyabinsk Oblast
title: Makhmut Gareev
